en: These are the verses of the clear Book.
Indeed, We have sent it down as an Arabic Qur’an
We relate to you, [O Muhammad], the best of stories
in what We have revealed to you of this Qur’an

ar: وَإِن كُنتَ مِن قَبْلِهِ لَمِنَ الْغَفِلِينَ
en: although you were, before it, among the unaware.
[Of these stories mention] when Joseph said to his father, "O my father,
indeed I have seen [in a dream] eleven stars
and the sun and the moon; I saw them prostrating to me."

ar: قَالَ يَبُنَىَّ لَا تَقْصُصْ رُءْيَاكَ عَلَى إِخْوَتِكَ
en: He said, "O my son, do not relate your vision to your brothers
or they will contrive against you a plan.
Indeed Satan, to man, is a manifest enemy.
